ABOUT DEVIATION STANDARD

WHAT ARE DATA BROKERS?

Data Brokers help companies improve an aspect of their business through the buying and selling of data. In today’s market, having the right data is the single largest determinant of a company’s success. Deviation Standard understands this complex and important aspect and works with your team to achieve your goals. We specialize in data procurement and monetization, brokering deals between buyers and sellers of data.

Whether you’re a small firm just getting started with digital marketing or data-based decision making, or an established company looking to gain an edge, we’re here to help you every step of the way.

LEARN MORE

OUR BUSINESS IS DATA. DATA IS OUR BUSINESS.

DATA PROCUREMENT

Data procurement is the process of finding sellers of data in the proper format, transforming it, and using it for making business decisions. We source, broker, and manage the delivery of data on your behalf, working closely with your IT team.

You provide the business need, and we’ll provide the solution.

Learn More

DATA MONETIZATION

If you’re in the business of business, then you’ve likely compiled a wealth of industry information. Depending on the type and quality, there is likely a market for it, and we have the network to identify it. We can work with you to find a buyer, and push to get you top dollar for it.

Like a great real estate agent, we won’t stop working until a buyer is found.

Learn More

DATA SCIENCE

What is data science as a service (DSS)? Besides being identified as the “sexiest job of the 21st century”, it can be the difference between growing your company and simply staying afloat. Having a strong data science team will help identify patterns, find inefficiencies and help categorize data, which can separate 5 and 25% growth. Beyond buying and selling, we will perform all the data science services necessary, including:

  • Data Preparation – Transformation and cleansing of data is normally the most time consuming task for all scientists. We will work to prepare every data set for your team to spend more team analyzing and less time fixing.
  • Data Loading – ETL, extract, transfer, and load is one of most highly demanded skill in information management. Let us help you get the data you needed setup in the right place.
  • Data Architecture – On premise or cloud based, we can design and setup the network and storage solution your business needs. With years of experience on the major cloud solution providers, let us architect a scalable, secure network.
  • Data Security – Information security is now understandably the top concern of over 80% of IT decision makers, one which gets more difficult by the day. We can secure and enforce your existing systems or design a new, robust data network to handle your business’s needs.

Learn More

WHY DEVIATION STANDARD?

There are a number of companies all vying for your business, how to decide which is best? We know choosing a data broker can be difficult, so let our expertise help guide your decision:

  • Over 15 years of Information Management experience, one of the first data brokerages in the US.
  • Proven success with small & medium sized companies as well as multinational enterprises.
  • Partnerships with major US & international data providers and marketing research firms, enabling procurement of any data type.
  • Large network of partner businesses looking for data sources to supplement their information warehouses.
  • Team of data scientists trained in both academia and private business in data mining and modeling.
  • Deep expertise in cloud computing and secure information management architecture.

Premium deals negotiated on your behalf
